title: "Leading US tech-enabled healthcare services company announces Modivcare Labs"
excerpt: "Modivcare Inc, the largest manager of non-emergency medical transportation (NEMT) in the United States, today announced the opening of Modivcare Labs in Bangalore, India. The USD 2.3 billion technology-enabled healthcare services company addresses the social determinants of health (SDoH) by bringing critical patient transportation,"
